headline: Phillips 66 (PSX): Navigating Opportunities in Energy Markets
summary: Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) is among the best oil & gas refinery stocks to buy now. On February 18, Reuters reported that U.S. refiner Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) is seeking approval to buy heavy crude directly from Venezuela’s state oil company PDVSA starting in April, aiming to boost profits by avoiding middlemen like Chevron and trading houses. […]
